author: The Hindu Net Desk
title: Coronavirus India lockdown Day 19 updates | Positive cases cross 8300, death toll at 287
description: The global death toll from the virus surged past 103,000, with the United States quickly becoming the epicentre of the pandemic.
content:
The nationwide lockdown to contain the deadly coronavirus looks set to be extended by two more weeks till April-end after a consensus emerged among States for continuing the curbs amid the tally of confirmed infections crossing 8,300.
